TopicTitle: problem whit an orbit of the contract

Articles.Content:
hi,i accepted a contract,it says: put a satellite in a specific orbit, when i launch my craft i can't see the orbit but when i am in the tracking station i see it

p.s. excuse my bad english i'm not really good at it

p.p.s. i think i am in the wrong section,isn't it

Edited April 7, 2017 by rotelini
I think you can only see the target orbit if you're in correct SOI. Eg. If you're in Kerbin orbit, you won't see target orbit around Kerbol.

13 minutes ago, The Aziz said:

I think you can only see the target orbit if you're in correct SOI. Eg. If you're in Kerbin orbit, you won't see target orbit around Kerbol.

I Think you are right. It can be Mün or Minmus too. You have to switch View to target Body to see the target Orbit.

Best example for this you have in a Change Orbit contract. If you are not in the target View of the right Body you see only Target rectangle on the Satellite. 

Funny Kabooms 

Urses

3 hours ago, rotelini said:

p.p.s. i think i am in the wrong section,isn't it

Yes, I'll move you to gameplay questions

Like Urses Said, if the orbit is for the Mün you should be able to see the contract if you click on the Mün (or whatever body the contract is) and select focus view.
thank now i can see it
one more question, can anyone explain me how a lab work?

16 minutes ago, rotelini said:

one more question, can anyone explain me how a lab work?

When reviewing experiment data on a ship with a lab, there will be a new yellow button with a lab icon. This button will send the experiment results to the lab rather than back to Kerbin, and a right click on the lab will show there is now data stored in it.

If you have scientists aboard the lab, you can then click "Start research", and they will slowly turn this data into Science points. Check back from time to time, and transmit the science back home  (that's an added Science for experiments, you can still send them the old way and get the Science too).
i wait a lot but the data didn't become scienze there is write o.o sci at day,why?

How much data do you have stored in the lab?

Do you have a scientist in the lab?

Did you click the "Start Research" button?

89 data,there is a scientist And i click start research 

I think It don't work because i use a Not stock Lab, i use The more Lab mod
